definition: to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate
Hong Kong, abbr. for 香港[Xiang1 gang3]/surname Gang

sentences.english: Passes to spectator stand and beer coupons are offered to bona-fide visitors only.
sentences.chinese: 观赏区入场券及啤酒畅饮券只供访港旅客使用。

sentences.english: Pray for great weather while the Doulos is in Hong Kong and pray against any typhoons.
sentences.chinese: 祈求船只访港其间有良好的天气，不受台风影响。

sentences.english: We are looking to create a portal which will be able to host high volume of vistors every hour.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望创建一个门户，可以每小时主办访港高音量。

definition: (Tw) tourist from mainland China/illegal immigrant from mainland China
Leung Chun-ying (1954-), 3rd Chief Executive of Hong Kong

pinyin: Ao4 men2 Guo2 ji4 Ji1 chang3

definition: Liaison Office of the Central People's Government in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (abbr. for 中央人民政府駐香港特別行政區聯絡辦公室|中央人民政府驻香港特别行政区联络办公室[Zhong1 yang1 Ren2 min2 Zheng4 fu3 Zhu4 Xiang1 gang3 Te4 bie2 Xing2 zheng4 qu1 Lian2 luo4 Ban4 gong1 shi4]) or the equivalent office in Macao
Hong Kong 香港 and Macao 澳門|澳门
